# Packages and Installation

```{r packages}
if(require(pacman) == FALSE) install.packages('pacman')
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, magrittr, rvest, lubridate)
```


## R Markdown

This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown [@megahed2015statistical].

When you click the **Knit** button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this:

```{r cars}
summary(cars)
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```
